EE004.name: Mountain Witch
EE004.ability: Creation: Summon a 1/1 Impling for every 1/1 Impling you own.

EE005.name: Death Witch
EE005.ability: Destruction: Summon a 1/1 Impling, then destroy all 1/1 Implings you own.

EE006.name: Life Witch
EE006.ability: Creation: Heal all other cards you own 1 Health for every Impling you own.

EE007.name: Time Witch
EE007.ability: Creation: For every 1/1 Impling destroyed this turn, summon a 1/1 Impling.

EE008.name: Swamp Witch
EE008.ability: Activate: Destroy a 1/1 Impling to summon a 1/1 Impling.

EE009.name: Plague Witch
EE009.ability: Destruction: Destroy all 1/1 Implings you own, then lose 1 life for every Impling destroyed this way.

EE010.name: Famine Witch
EE010.ability: Activate: Lose 1 life, then summon a 1/1 Impling.

EE011.name: Glutton Witch
EE011.ability: Activate: Destroy a 1/1 Impling, else destroy this card.

EE012.name: Hand Witch
EE012.ability: Existence: If you own a 1/1 Impling, immediately play this card.

EE013.name: Blood Witch
EE013.ability: Activate: If you own a 1/1 Impling, destroy it, then heal this card to full health.

EE014.name: Lust Witch
EE014.ability: Creation: If any other cards on the field is a Witch card, destroy this card.

EE015.name: Wrath Witch
EE015.ability: Activate: If there are any 1/1 Implings on the field, immediately attack one.

EE017.name: Envy Witch
EE017.ability: Creation: If any Witch card was destroyed this turn, summon a copy of the destroyed card for the opponent.

EE018.name: Crazy Witch
EE018.ability: Destruction: Destroy one other Witch card you own.
